locations: Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA::(Opening Sequence)
imdb.plot outline: Recently single after being married for (what seems like) forever, and WOW has the dating world changed. Our makeover candidates are "back on the market" hitting the dating scene, and need major help becoming "marketable" again to prospective "buyers" (AKA: soulmates). With the help of 4 sexy pros in Fashion, Design, Culinary Arts and Makeup, our "fixer uppers" learn to navigate the online dating game, reinvent themselves and (hopefully) find true love, once and for all.
imdb.title: Back on the Market
plot: Recently single after being married for (what seems like) forever, and WOW has the dating world changed.
